verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w waiteth|strong="H1747"\w* for thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in \w Sion|strong="H6726"\w*: and unto thee shall the \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* be \w performed|strong="H7999"\w*.\f + \fr 65.1 \ft waiteth: Heb. is silent\f*
O thou that \w hearest|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, unto thee shall all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w Iniquities|strong="H1697"\w* \w prevail|strong="H1396"\w* against me: \add as for\add* our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, thou shalt purge them \w away|strong="H3722"\w*.\f + \fr 65.3 \ft Iniquities: Heb. Words, or, Matters of iniquities\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is the man whom\add* thou \w choosest|strong="H0977"\w*, and causest to \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \add unto thee, that\add* he may \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in thy \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*: we shall be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with the \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add even\add* of thy \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

\add By\add* terrible \w things|strong="H3372"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* wilt thou \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* us, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; \add who art\add* the \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* of all the \w ends|strong="H7099"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and of them that are afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w* \add upon\add* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*:
Which by his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* setteth \w fast|strong="H3559"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; \add being\add* \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* with \w power|strong="H1369"\w*:

Which \w stilleth|strong="H7623"\w* the \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* of the \w seas|strong="H3220"\w*, the \w noise|strong="H7588"\w* of their \w waves|strong="H1530"\w*, and the \w tumult|strong="H1995"\w* of the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*.

They also that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the uttermost \w parts|strong="H7099"\w* are \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* at thy \w tokens|strong="H0226"\w*: thou makest the \w outgoings|strong="H4161"\w* of the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w*.\f + \fr 65.8 \ft rejoice: or, sing\f*

Thou \w visitest|strong="H6485"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w waterest|strong="H7783"\w* it: thou \w greatly|strong="H7227"\w* \w enrichest|strong="H6238"\w* it with the \w river|strong="H6388"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add which\add* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: thou \w preparest|strong="H3559"\w* them \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, when thou hast so \w provided|strong="H3559"\w* for it.\f + \fr 65.9 \ft and…: or, after thou hadst made it to desire rain\f*

Thou \w waterest|strong="H7301"\w* the \w ridges|strong="H8525"\w* thereof \w abundantly|strong="H7301"\w*: thou \w settlest|strong="H5181"\w* the \w furrows|strong="H1417"\w* thereof: thou makest it \w soft|strong="H4127"\w* with \w showers|strong="H7241"\w*: thou \w blessest|strong="H1288"\w* the \w springing|strong="H6780"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 65.10 \ft settlest: or, causest rain to descend into\f*\f + \fr 65.10 \ft makest…: Heb. dissolvest it\f*

Thou \w crownest|strong="H5849"\w* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* with thy \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w*; and thy \w paths|strong="H4570"\w* \w drop|strong="H7491"\w* \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*.\f + \fr 65.11 \ft with: Heb. of\f*

They \w drop|strong="H7491"\w* \add upon\add* the \w pastures|strong="H4999"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: and the little \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1524"\w* on every \w side|strong="H2296"\w*.\f + \fr 65.12 \ft rejoice…: Heb. are girded with joy\f*

The \w pastures|strong="H3733"\w* are \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*; the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* also are covered \w over|strong="H5848"\w* with \w corn|strong="H1250"\w*; they shout for \w joy|strong="H7321"\w*, they also \w sing|strong="H7891"\w*.
